title: Nihari
procedure: Heat mustard oil in a large pot and add onions, cooking till golden brown.
Add ginger garlic paste and cook till fragrant.
Add lamb shanks and saut√© on high heat for 5 minutes.
Mix in turmeric, red chili powder, and coriander powder.
Sprinkle nihari masala and mix well.
Pour in water, cover, and simmer for 2 hours.
Make a slurry with flour and water, add to the pot, and cook till the gravy thickens.
Garnish with coriander and serve with naan or paratha.
